nodes.bodyText: Instead of maintaining an extra variable, you could instead test on mapping.getHandlers().length == 1 and shortcut to mapping.getHandlers()[0].
That's what I did first up, then thought this was simpler.... but your way is probably less cost for those that do have multiple contexts, so I will revert
For the record I suggested getting rid of the extra field not for efficiency, but for simplicity. :-)
